titleStmt.title: A young man's fancy to the rising generation being a sermon preached upon the death, and at the desire of John Tappin of Boston, who deceased at Fairfield the 10th of October 1672, being in the nineteenth year of his age / by Samuel Wakeman ...
titleStmt.author: Wakeman, Samuel, 1635-1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
